author: greg_duncan
title: I like it, I really do!
review: this game is good, though not as well done as lego star wars. the controls are ok, though the perspectives are irritating. this game is not hard to beat, and is a good time waster...ahem... I mean spender, and the cutscenes are kinda cool. this game is way better than the pc version, and worth the money if on sale.
